fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Investigate a player to learn their exact faction during the night.
- Read into the factions of a player's voters during the day. 1 Use, refund if unsuccessful.
- Post to Insurgents during the day. Only usable on odd days, excluding day 1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you read into a player's voters, if that player is successfully lynched, you will learn how many people of each faction voted for that person.
- When you post to Insurgents, you may send a message, however long, to all other Insurgents. In this post, you may not reveal yourself or any other Insurgent.
- Frame Immunity
